H0.text: Who is the most successful UK solo artist in the USA. Leona Lewis

H1.text: Who is the most successful UK solo artist in the USA. Rod Stewart

H2.text: Who is the most successful UK solo artist in the USA. Sting

H3.text: Who is the most successful UK solo artist in the USA. Sir Elton

A4.text: Stewart has had 16 top-ten singles in the US, with four reaching number one on the Billboard Hot 100.

A5.text: He was inducted into the US Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994.
